summary: A simple Japanese style sword held by the player in 2 hands and stored on the player's back. Has a typical black and gold colour scheme.
descriptionHtml:
A simple Japanese style sword held by the player in 2 hands and stored on the player's back. Has a typical black and gold colour scheme. Made as a request for Hotdog Lady. 

Can be crafted using steel, under the Steel category at a forge, or can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood on the central hearth. Has the same stats as a Glass Greatsword. Comes with a wooden sheath. 

If you have any problems post a comment and I'll see what I can do. 

----- 

Mods used in screenshots: 
Realvision ENB 
HD Official textures 
Elven Rogue Armour by Nana: http://iamthekingofsass.tumblr.com/post/77672972304/e-l-v-e-n-r-o-g-u-e-elven 
Face Masks of Skyrim by Volvaga0: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391/? 
Grimoa's Scarves and Gugels: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17401/? 
Ponytail: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=131617688&searchtext=ponytail
author: Amorbis - Spectravideo
